text: Peter Mociulski von Remenyk (September 3, 1945 – April 16, 2016), known professionally as Peter Rock, was an Austrian-born Chilean rock and roll and nueva ola musician. He sang in Festival de Viña del Mar and in Bierfest Valdivia. He was born near Vienna in 1945, shortly after the death of his father. His mother remarried and the family emigrated to Chile in 1955. Peter Rock's son, Justin Leigh, resides in Los Angeles and his daughter Natalie lived with him in Santiago, Chile. Peter Rock is Alain Johannes' uncle.SOBRINO DE PETER ROCK GURÚ DEL ROCK ALTERNATIVO VIENE A MOSTRAR CUÁNTO SABE AL MAQUINARIA In October 2014, he was diagnosed with ALS, which kept him in a wheelchair. He died on Viña del Mar on April 16, 2016. == References == == External links == *La Cuarta - La inmortal Nueva Ola *MúsicaPopular.cl Peter Rock Category:1945 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Austrian emigrants to Chile Category:Chilean guitarists Category:Chilean male guitarists Category:Chilean male singers Category:Chilean rock singers Category:Chilean singer-songwriters Category:Chilean people of Austrian descent Category:Musicians from Vienna Category:Deaths from motor neuron disease Category:Naturalized citizens of Chile
title: Peter Rock (musician)
